org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.pltl2ba

Class PLTL2BAOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
        • java.util.Properties
          • org.svvrl.goal.core.Properties
            • org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.pltl2ba.PLTL2BAOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>

    public class PLTL2BAOptions
extends Properties
    This class contains several options for the PLTL2BA translation algorithm. The initial values of the options depend on the preference set by the user.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      static java.lang.String O_ADVANCED_REDUCE_NTGBW_TRANSITIONS
      The option of advanced reduction of NTGBW transitions.
      static java.lang.String O_SIMPLIFY_NTGBW
      The option of simplifying NTGBW by direct and reverse simulation relations.
      static java.lang.String SimplifyFormulaKey
      The option key of simplifying formula before translation.
      static java.lang.String SimplifyNBWKey
      The key of the option of simplifying NBW before projecting quantified variables.
      static java.lang.String SupersetReductionKey
      The key of the option of simplifying the acceptance condition of NTGBW.

      • SimplifyFormulaKey

        public static final java.lang.String SimplifyFormulaKey
        The option key of simplifying formula before translation.

      • O_ADVANCED_REDUCE_NTGBW_TRANSITIONS

        public static final java.lang.String O_ADVANCED_REDUCE_NTGBW_TRANSITIONS
        The option of advanced reduction of NTGBW transitions. This is an alias of TWVWAA2NTGBW.O_ADVANCED_REDUCE_NTGBW_TRANSITIONS.

      • O_SIMPLIFY_NTGBW

        public static final java.lang.String O_SIMPLIFY_NTGBW
        The option of simplifying NTGBW by direct and reverse simulation relations.

      • SupersetReductionKey

        public static final java.lang.String SupersetReductionKey
        The key of the option of simplifying the acceptance condition of NTGBW.

      • SimplifyNBWKey

        public static final java.lang.String SimplifyNBWKey
        The key of the option of simplifying NBW before projecting quantified variables.
